CmdLine: rm -f /etc/service/sshd/down &&     echo 'PermitEmptyPasswords yes' >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&     echo 'PasswordAuthentication yes' >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&     useradd         --shell /bin/bash         --create-home --base-dir /home         --user-group         --groups sudo,ssh         --password ''         vagrant &&     mkdir -p /home/vagrant/.ssh &&     chown -R vagrant:vagrant /home/vagrant/.ssh &&     apt-get -y update &&     apt-get -y upgrade &&     apt-get -y install         sudo         python         python3         python-dev         python3-dev         python-pip         python3-pip         aptitude     &&     chmod u+w ${SUDOFILE} &&     echo '%sudo   ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL' >> ${SUDOFILE} &&     chmod u-w ${SUDOFILE} &&     apt-get clean &&     pip3 install --upgrade pip &&     pip install ansible &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* &&     touch -t 197001010000 /var/lib/apt/periodic/update-success-stamp &&     sed -i '/tty/!s/mesg n/true/' /root/.profile
Commands.Name: run
